description: Contract enables anyone to lock any ERC20 token for a specified period of time.

eventDecorators.name: Tokens locked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted every time an account locks some amount of the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Account
parameterDecorators.description: Caller account which locked the tokens

parameterDecorators.name: Token
parameterDecorators.description: Token which was locked in this event

parameterDecorators.name: Lockup period
parameterDecorators.description: Total time for which the tokes are going to be locked (in seconds)

eventDecorators.name: Tokens locked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted every time an account locks some amount of the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Account
parameterDecorators.description: Caller account which unlocked the tokens

parameterDecorators.name: Token
parameterDecorators.description: Token which was unlocked in this event

parameterDecorators.name: Token lock id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the token lock action for specific to the caller account. Every token lock action gets its own id used for tracking the state.

functionDecorators.name: Contract name
functionDecorators.description: Returns unique contract name inside the dev3 namespace

functionDecorators.name: Lock tokens
functionDecorators.description: Locks the tokens for a given period of time

parameterDecorators.name: Amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the tokens to lock

parameterDecorators.name: Lockup period
parameterDecorators.description: Duration of the lockup period (in seconds)

parameterDecorators.name: Description
parameterDecorators.description: Arbitrary note to connect to this lockup action

parameterDecorators.name: Admin account
parameterDecorators.description: Admin account with the rights to unlock the tokens unconditionally (optional parameter)

functionDecorators.name: Get lock status
functionDecorators.description: Fetches the status of a specific lock action

parameterDecorators.name: Account
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the account for which the status is checked

parameterDecorators.name: Lockup Id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the lockup action executed by the given account

returnDecorators.name: Created at
returnDecorators.description: Exact point in time when tokens were locked

returnDecorators.name: Description
returnDecorators.description: Arbitrary note connected to this lockup action

returnDecorators.name: Admin account
returnDecorators.description: Account with the special rights to unconditionally unlock tokens

functionDecorators.name: Get locks for account
functionDecorators.description: Returns the list of all of the token locks and their statuses

parameterDecorators.name: Account
parameterDecorators.description: Account for which the locks activity is fetched

returnDecorators.name: Created at
returnDecorators.description: Exact point in time when tokens were locked

returnDecorators.name: Description
returnDecorators.description: Arbitrary note connected to this lockup action

returnDecorators.name: Admin account
returnDecorators.description: Account with the special rights to unconditionally unlock tokens

functionDecorators.name: Unlock tokens
functionDecorators.description: Unlocks the tokens for account if the lockup period has expired

parameterDecorators.name: Account
parameterDecorators.description: Account holder of the locked tokens

parameterDecorators.name: Lockup Id
parameterDecorators.description: Tokens to unlock for a given account. Provided as the index of the item in the list fetched from the token locks list for the given account.

functionDecorators.name: Contract version
functionDecorators.description: Returns implementation version of the contract maintained by the dev3 organization
